channel.title: [PI] error with command

item.title: [PI] error with command
item.dc:creator: @santa_skillz santa skillz
item.description:
@santa_skillz wrote:

thats the error i get


src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:1165: error: ')' expected
                        c.sendMessage(" ::yell "message" will send message to wh
ole server");
                                                ^
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:1165: error: not a statement
                        c.sendMessage(" ::yell "message" will send message to wh
ole server");
                                                       ^
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:1165: error: ';' expected
                        c.sendMessage(" ::yell "message" will send message to wh
ole server");

           ^
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

After trying to edit this command


}
			if (playerCommand.startsWith("commands")){
			c.sendMessage("<shad=60811334> <img=1> Exiled-Nation Commands Available <img=1>");
			c.sendMessage(" ::sit You sit on a chair");
			c.sendMessage(" ::donate Shows donation info ");
			c.sendMessage(" ::pkp Shows you the amount of PKP");
			c.sendMessage(" ::changepassword *newpasswordhere* changes your password");
			c.sendMessage(" ::register Takes you to our forums");
			c.sendMessage(" ::lunar teleports you to get lunar mage book");
			c.sendMessage(" ::ancient teleports you to get ancient mage book");
			c.sendMessage(" ::curses teleports you to get curses prayers");
			c.sendMessage(" ::highpk Multi area pk level 47 wildy");
			c.sendMessage(" ::Master");
			c.sendMessage(" ::setlevel set your own levels.");
			c.sendMessage(" ::request Will let a staff memeber know you need help");
			c.sendMessage(" ::yell "message" will send message to whole server");
			}
